Maximum Likelhood Analysis

Source: R/analyse.R
ml_analyse.Rd

Maximum Likelhood Analysis

ml_analyse(expr, pars, data)

Arguments

expr

A string of R code that evaluates to the log-likelihood.
pars

An named list of the parameter initial values (coerced to an nlist object).
data

An named list of the data (coerced to an nlist object).

Value

An ml_analysis object.

Examples

template <- "sum(dnorm(len, mu, sigma, log = TRUE))"
pars <- list(mu = 20, sigma = 8)
data <- datasets::ToothGrowth
analysis <- ml_analyse(template, pars = pars, data = data)
analysis
